text: Karim Akbari Mobarakeh , () (6 June 1953 – 29 October 2020) was an Iranian actor and movie director. He was born in Tehran, Iran. His career began in 1971. He was known for his acting roles as Abd-al in Shaheed-e-Kufa (1992) and as Ahmar in Mokhtarnameh (2012). Akbari Mobarakeh died of COVID-19 in Tehran on 29 October 2020 at the age of 67.کریم اکبری مبارکه، بازیگر، به‌ دلیل ابتلا به کرونا درگذشت ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Karim Akbari Mobarakeh
